turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sorry about that. I'd like to buy a drink from Starbucks, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a caramel macchiato?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a vente?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can a 2% milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you add whipped cream with a dash of cinnamon, please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And a drizzle of caramel on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: a venti caramel machiatto with 2% milk, whipped cream and a dash of cinnamon and caramel, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pickup your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: East Charleston Boulevard in Las Vegas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at east charleston blvd.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to you via text, enjoy your coffee!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, bye!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
